title: A Passion for Bad Fashion: Motherf*ckin Mini Episode (RE-RELEASE)
itunes:title: A Passion for Bad Fashion: Motherf*ckin Mini Episode (RE-RELEASE)
description:
Hey MMTM Listeners! Langston and David will be back making motherf*ckin' mini episodes soon. In the meantime rate and review the podcast or send your conspiracy theories/thoughts over to mymommapod@gmail.com

Los Angeles Listeners - Check out Langston and David on Thursday, 9/15. Ticket info below:

Buy David Tickets @ The Elysian

Buy Langston Tickets @ Lyric Hyperion

---

Langston and David answer a listener's email about gay stylists intentionally dressing rappers bad as revenge for their homophobic lyrics.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
